text: Microcerotermes heimi, is a species of small termite of the genus Microcerotermes. It is found from Maharashtra area of India and from Sri Lanka. It can be found from forests, in dead stumps and under bark of trees. ==References== ==External links== *Evolution and Systematic Significance of Wing Micro-sculpturing *Light as a limiting factor in the flight behaviour of termite Category:Termites Category:Insects described in 1902
title: Microcerotermes heimi
